var initialState={plants:[]};for(var i=0;i<30;i++){var random=Math.random()*98;var random2=Math.random()*98;var height=Math.floor(random/2)*2;var width=Math.floor(random2/2)*2;//Generate new plant and add it to initial state
var newPlant={top:height,left:width};initialState.plants.push(newPlant);}var plantsReducer=function plantsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.plants;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_PLANTS':return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default plantsReducer;
